title: Lowest Bribery Incidence Among Firms
description: In 2019, only 0.2% of firms in Cyprus reported experiencing at least one bribe payment request, indicating a very low level of corruption in business transactions.

title: Perfect Female Education Continuity
description: In 2021, Cyprus achieved a 100% persistence rate for females reaching grade 5 and the last grade of primary education, showcasing a strong commitment to female education.

title: Minimal Poverty Levels
description: As of 2021, only 0.1% of the population in Cyprus lived below the poverty line of $8.30 a day, reflecting a high standard of living and effective poverty alleviation measures.
